data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The kitchen in our house is very big. We ____ a ____ oven ____ can ____ a ____ of ____, ____ a ____ table. There ____ three ____ windows. A plant sits next to the sink where there is sun and water.
data.partBlankContent: The kitchen in our house is very big. We ha__ a n__ oven th__ can co__ a l__ of fo__, a__ a woo___ table. There a__ three sm___ windows. A plant sits next to the sink where there is sun and water.
data.fullContent: The kitchen in our house is very big. We have a new oven that can cook a lot of food, and a wooden table. There are three small windows. A plant sits next to the sink where there is sun and water.
data.answer: 我们家的厨房非常大。我们有一个新的烤箱,可以煮很多的食物,和一个木制的桌子。有三个小窗户。工厂坐落在水槽哪里有阳光和水。
